General.Name: Indo Kordsa Tbk
General.Description: PT Indo Kordsa Tbk manufactures, markets, and sells tire cord fabrics, yarn filaments, nylon tire cord, and raw materials of polyester in Indonesia, Thailand, the United States, Japan, Korea, India, Taiwan, Brazil, Vietnam, China, South Africa, Turkey, and internationally. It operates through Tire Cord Fabric, Nylon Yarn, and Polyester Yarn segments. The company offers nylon, polyester, and rayon fibers. The company was formerly known as PT Branta Mulia Tbk and changed its name to PT Indo Kordsa Tbk in 2006. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia. PT Indo Kordsa Tbk is a subsidiary of Kordsa Teknik Tekstil A.S.
